windows::overlapped_ptr::overlapped_ptr

overlapped_ptr();

Construct an windows::overlapped_ptr to contain the specified handler. 

template<
    typename Handler>
explicit overlapped_ptr(
    asio::io_service & io_service,
    Handler handler);
